title: Bright 1 bed loft condo in Fitler Square at Locust Point
description:
2429 Locust Street #520 -- Bright and airy 1-bedroom loft at the Locust Point Condominium in desirable Fitler Square. This updated unit has gorgeous city views with wall-to-wall windows, hardwood floors, an upgraded bathroom, in-unit washer/dryer, and 14' ceilings. The kitchen has a fantastic layout and features granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and an eating bar that's open to the living space. Built-in shoe rack along the stairs leading to the loft. The updated bathroom, conveniently located between the loft and living space, features a stall shower with built-in shelving. The loft space has a large closet and receives plenty of light from the oversized windows below. The best of city living. Locust Point is a wonderful elevator building with a nice gym, bike storage, and outdoor patio and grill. An amazing location: 95 Walk Score, 91 Bike Score, and 100 Transit Score. Situated along the Schuylkill River Trail, Boardwalk, park, and dog park. Quick walk to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, 30th Street, and everything that Center City has to offer. Locust Point charges a $600 move in fee.

title: Welcome to 530 S 2nd St Fully Furnished Condo in Beautiful Condition!
description:
Welcome to 530 South 2nd Street, Unit 819 a fully furnished condo in beautiful condition! Walk into a newly renovated open concept kitchen, finished with new hardware and cabinetry designed for maximum storage. The kitchen is also equipped with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a spacious peninsula, perfect for dining and entertaining. Continue into the airy living room where you will find ample space for lounging on the couch or working at the newly custom built-in desk. The couch easily turns into a queen-size sleeper sofa, ideal for hosting friends or family overnight! Off the living room you will find the bedroom, recently fitted with new windows and stylish, yet practical, plantation shutters. The master closet was recently transformed into the ultimate dream closet! Designed by California Closets, no expense was spared to ensure that you will have more than enough space for your wardrobe. Also, off the living room you will find the bathroom with beautiful stone tile throughout, generous storage space, and a shower/tub completed with bath jets. Here you will also find your very own washer and dryer. Not only is the inside of this unit amazing, but the private covered balcony offering picturesque views of the city provides the perfect combination of indoor-outdoor living. This unit comes fully furnished, with all the furniture being in excellent condition. Also included is complete access to the gym in the building, an outdoor garden with seating, 24/7 security, and access to a covered parking garage with the option to rent a parking space. Located in the historic area of Society Hill, this unit is surrounded by charm and beauty. You also can't beat the convenience of being only steps away from award-winning restaurants, bars, coffee shops, bakeries, and more. title: Charming Studio , Close To Train
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
